cwn_entry.cwn_title: m17n: multilingualization for OCaml source code
cwn_entry.cwn_what:
I'm glad to present m17n, a package that allows using Unicode identifiers in the OCaml source code.
type 色 = | @赤 | @黄色 | @緑色 [@@deriving show]
let () = print_endline (show_色 @赤)
See the complete description and installation instructions on [1]. (It will take a few hours before OPAM is synchronized properly).
[1]: https://github.com/whitequark/ocaml-m17n

I'm glad to announce ppx_include, a syntax extension to include OCaml source files in each other. It will be available in OPAM shortly.
See the README at [1] for details.
[1]: https://github.com/whitequark/ppx_include
